channel.title: About The Server Status List
channel.description:
I think people should be allowed to delete there own server on the list. because it gets really over crowded when there is tons of pages and half the server are not even online half the time.
and i would like to get my server deleted off the list please.
name is project infinity

item.title: About The Server Status List
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

First off, your question is more relevant on www.moparisthebest.com.

As well, we donâ€™t allow people to delete their servers, simply because it will result in abuse (they delete the servers, and repost them to get 100% uptime).

Read full topic
